EXTERNAL VERSION LIST
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bullet - 2.88 (<https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/releases>)
CrashRpt - 1.5 fork (<https://github.com/Tomash667/crashrpt2>)
DirectX - Microsoft DirectX SDK (June 2010)
DirectXMath - 3.13 (<https://github.com/Microsoft/DirectXMath/releases>)
FMod - 1.10.14 (Low level API <https://www.fmod.com/resources/documentation-api?page=content/generated/common/revision.html>)
Visual Leak Detector - 2.5.1 (<https://github.com/KindDragon/vld/releases>)
zlib - 1.2.11 (<https://github.com/madler/zlib/releases>)
